message.entry: Supported GPU not found. Update the 'ExecutionEnvironment' on trainingOptions to 'cpu'. Or, to automatically determine if a GPU is available, use 'auto'.
The trainingData must either be a valid datastore or a valid transform/combine datastore.
Invalid value for 'FreezeSubNetwork'. The supported values are "none", "Backbone", or "BackboneAndNeck".
The ground truth labels in the trainingData input should have the same categories as the ClassNames on the solov2 network object.
Invalid SOLOV2 network. The network should be an object of type solov2. Please use the solov2() function to create the network.
